deals.title: Mango Lassi
deals.itemDescription: Mango lassi is a delicious and creamy Indian beverage made by blending ripe mangoes with yogurt, milk, sugar, and a touch of saffron. It's a refreshing and sweet drink that combines the natural sweetness of mangoes with the tanginess of yogurt, resulting in a smooth and tropical-flavored treat.

itemDescriptionBadge.text: Mango lassi is a delicious and creamy Indian beverage made by blending ripe mangoes with yogurt, milk, sugar, and a touch of saffron. It's a refreshing and sweet drink that combines the natural sweetness of mangoes with the tanginess of yogurt, resulting in a smooth and tropical-flavored treat.

deals.title: 10 pc. Saucy Nuggets
deals.itemDescription: Sauce availability varies by location. Discover the perfect harmony of flavors with our KFC Saucy Nuggets! Enjoy 10 of our juicy, hand-breaded crispy chicken nuggets tossed in your choice of one of our flavorful sauces: NEW Honey Garlic: Classic taste of Honey and Garlic with a little kick of heat for a blast of flavor; NEW Chipotle Ranch: Bold flavors from the mildly spicy and smoky blend of chipotle peppers and creamy ranch; NEW Mango Habanero: Mash up of fruity Mango, fiery Habanero peppers and savory flavors to create the perfectly balanced Swicy sauce; KFC's Signature Honey BBQ: A sweet, smoky and tangy sauce, with brown sugar and honey rounding out tanginess of tomato and secret spices; or Korean BBQ: A sweet and savory umami sauce with soy sauce, garlic, sugar and sesame. Order online at a KFC near you!

itemDescriptionBadge.text: Sauce availability varies by location. Discover the perfect harmony of flavors with our KFC Saucy Nuggets!
